message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is considerably below its true value. I could meet you halfway at $17,500.  This offer demonstrates my willingness to make a deal, while still reflecting the product's worth.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for the product. I hope we can find a middle ground.
